features: 12-Cup* Coffeemaker - Fast brewing for up to 12 cups* of coffee.
Vortex Technology - The exclusive showerhead design evenly saturates coffee grounds, resulting in maximum flavor.
Sneak-A-Cup Feature - Temporarily stops the flow of coffee so you can pour your first cup before brewing ends without making a mess.
Digital Controls - Quick Touch programming lets you set the digital clock and program the 24-hour auto brew feature so you can brew coffee now or later.
Removable Brew Basket - Cleanup is easy with the dishwasher-safe brew basket, which is compatible with basket-style paper filters.
body.description: Enjoy rich flavor extraction with the BLACK+DECKER™ 12-Cup* Programmable Coffeemaker. The Vortex™ Technology Water Flow evenly saturates coffee grounds using optimal water flow for maximum flavor. You can change the brew strength for a stronger cup of coffee. Sneak-A-Cup™ Technology lets you pour a cup of coffee before the rest of the pot has brewed—all without any drips or spills. The digital controls feature QuickTouch™ Programming so you can easily set the clock and program the auto brew system for coffee now or later at the touch of a button. *cup equals approximately 5 oz. (varies by brewing technique)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and dependable
reviews.reviewText: I like its simplicity. I just want a cup of good coffee and it can be programmed for whatever time you want it. Also reminds you when it needs cleaning. Fast, convenient, and reasonably priced. All I need in a coffee maker.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 6, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black & Decker 12 Cup Programmable Coffee Maker (Model #DCM100B)
reviews.reviewText: I've had this coffee maker for about one month and that's enough time to learn all the good and bad things about it. I have to give this coffee maker two thumbs up. I absolutely love it. I've read other comments about how noisey it is or it doesn't keep the coffee hot after brewing, etc, but I have not found those things to be true at all. Mine is quiet, and keeps the coffee plenty hot after brewing. Its easy to clean and I have discovered that if I fill the water to the weep hole in the back, I can get almost 14 cups out of this 12 cup coffee maker. The best part about this coffee maker is it makes very, very good coffee and no spill when you pour it into your cup. I haven't found any bad things about it. It makes great coffee and easy to use, so I don't know what more a person could ask for. I don't know how long this coffee maker will last, but I sure love it. I'm going to buy another one to have as a "back-up" when this one gives out just in case this model will no longer be available. Yes sir, this dog will hunt. Y'all take care.One Year Update: I originally purchased this coffee maker in June of 2020 it is now July 2021 and it is still making great coffee without any problems. I'm an avid coffee drinker, so this coffee maker does get a workout. Still operates and performs just as it did the first day of use. Takes about 12 minutes to make a full pot of coffee and still tastes great and works great in all respects. I take care of it and do not abuse it. I clean it when it needs it and always use filtered water. Its wonderful. I have read many reviews, the good and the bad, and I respect all opinions and experiences that are shared, but for me...... all good here. In fact, all is great here. The last coffe maker I had lasted more than 15 years and I would have bought another one of those, but they don't make it anymore. I expect this one to give me many years of service as well. Y'all take care.Two Year Update: July 1, 2022 It's still working great! Works the same as the day I received it. No problems. I'll update again in 2023, y'all take care.Three year update: June1, 2023 I purchased it in June 2020 and its been three years and happy to report that it is working great and I'm having a cup of coffee as i type this. I believe that coffee makers, at least most brands, last a long time if you take care of them. Yes, there are alway going to be exceptions to that rule, but keep them clean and give it a vinegar flush at leat three times per year and as stated earlier, I only use filtered water. I won't be giving anymore yearly updates, but I will update again when, and if, this coffee maker stops working. Hope this review give some insight as to my experience thus far. Y'all take care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good, simple coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: This unit has everything you would expect from a basic coffee maker. I love the flavor of the coffee I make in it. The heating element keeps the brewed coffee hotter than our old one and heats leftover coffee faster. The only issues is lifting the lid will drip condensation down the back of the unit instead of into the water fill area and the carafe is one of those that will drip as you pour if you don't hold it the right way or go too fast.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A good quality coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: So far it seems to be working great. So easy to easy to understand directions.But it is a little slow when make you the coffee.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keep your money
reviews.reviewText: Complete junk. This is why I do not write reviews promoted the next day I receive.Cheaply made. Constantly over flows. Does not filter through coffee grinds correctly. Filter area is difficult to get in and out properly. Sharp edges when removing and replacing filter cup. No I would not buy again or suggest. Just wanted a simple coffee maker. This thing is probably worth $2 at best. Disappointed again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent coffee maker. Has a strong brew button and cleaning reminder feature, both are added pluses for this model, which replaces my previous B&D coffee maker, and the water tank is very easy to fill. It brews twelve cups in approximately twelve minutes, and keeps the coffee hot for two hours after brewing without the taste being affected. Overall, an awesome product from Black & Decker's line of small appliances!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple coffeemaker and Coffee that tastes great!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never been able to make coffee at home that tastes good. With this coffee maker the coffee tastes great. Smooth tasting, no bitterness. I’ll never buy another cheap off brand coffeemaker again. The coffeemaker does make a difference in the way the coffee tastes.As other reviews stated, the clock is not backlit and condensation does accumulate on it. But these are not deal breakers for me.The no spill feature is great and I like the two hour shutoff because I don’t have to remember to turn it off.This is my first Black & Decker coffeemaker and I hope (expect) it lasts for years. Love this coffeemaker!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cadillac of coffee makers
reviews.reviewText: My husband refers to this easy to use coffee machine as "a cadillac". He said it works so well and so fast! We both think it keeps the flavor of the coffee really well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and makes great coffee
reviews.reviewText: Affordable, can set it to brew at any time you choose, and most importantly must have the right temperatures for brewing as the coffee tastes great! Also the design is simple and clean and can fit into most decors.
This is one of many coffee machines we have purchased over the years. This was purchased as a replacement and we are happy with it. It is easy to clean and keeps the coffee warm for a long time.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seems great, but lots of condensation inside and outside
reviews.reviewText: This will have all the features you want at the price you like. It works as advertised.The one thing I don't like is the condensation that can appear on the control panel. I worry about the buttons and controls being exposed to that much moisture over the long term. I've only had it for a month; so I don't know if it will have a negative impact. There is also condensation on the inside - on the lid that lifts up. I'm less worried about that and just find it annoying at times.

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes a GREAT cup of tea
reviews.reviewText: Look... I know that this is a coffee maker. I don't drink coffee, but I DO drink a lot of tea. As long as you NEVER make coffee in your coffee maker it will make a nice cup of tea. I just put 2 tea bags in where the filter goes (no filter required) and put in the water like you would for coffee and turn it on. It makes a full 12 cup pot of tea and the warmer keeps it warm. I love the timer. It works well and a lovely cup of tea awaits me when I get up in the morning.I want to elaborate a bit on the "NEVER make coffee" comment. If you ever make a pot of coffee you will never be able to clean it well enough to make tea. Your tea will have a stale coffee after taste and you will not be happy. If you have a need for both coffee AND tea, this maker is cost effective enough that you can buy 2; one for coffee and one for tea. Just don't ever mix up which one is which.Excellent buy, brews the full 12 cups in no time.
